meanings.definition: The quality or state of being shrewish
meanings.sent1: Her constant shrewishnesses made it hard to enjoy family gatherings.
meanings.sent2: The shrewishnesses of the old lady next door were well-known in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: Despite her shrewishnesses, she always had a soft spot for stray animals.
meanings.sent4: The shrewishnesses in her tone could shatter glass.
meanings.sent5: The dark cloud of shrewishnesses followed her wherever she went.

meanings.definition: The behavior or characteristics of a shrewish person
meanings.sent1: Dealing with her shrewishnesses was like walking on eggshells.
meanings.sent2: He couldn't stand her constant shrewishnesses towards the staff.
meanings.sent3: Her shrewishnesses seemed to vanish whenever she was around children.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the shrewishnesses of the two arguing women.
meanings.sent5: The movie character's shrewishnesses added humor to the plot.
